website_summaries.verdict: If you work on a lot of cars and have a lift, this oil drain is a reliable and relatively inexpensive option.
pros: Durable and constructed of heavy-duty steel for long-lasting use
Works well without leaks or spills
Functions well at a good price
cons: This is a drain pan designed to work only with cars on a lift

customer_reviews.title: I love this
customer_reviews.text: I bought this right after building a pole barn and installing a lift. So nice to be able to drain oil neatly and conveniently. This caddy can hold oil from several cars. When near full you can conveniently apply an air hose and pump the oil out. For me, I pump into a large tank on a skid where I store oil for burning in a waste oil heater to heat my shop.
customer_reviews.author: John G

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY LEAKING NIGHTMARE
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS THE THRID TIME IT HAS LEAKED. I HAVE USED TEFLON TAPE AND THREAD SEALANT ON ALL THREE ATTEMPTS. I'M ABOUT TO USE AN AXE AND CRUSH THIS THING.
customer_reviews.author: Star Master Tech

customer_reviews.title: The way to go!
customer_reviews.text: I spent lots of time looking for a good oil drain for my shop. I looked at all of them from HF to Lincoln brand and everything in between and my conclusion is that this ARSKEN was the best in quality and value. It arrived well packed. Assemble was easy and no special tools required for the clips on the wheels as some folks have said in their reviews. This was a great addition to my new lift set up. I am currently looking at the ARSKEN radiator tester as well.
customer_reviews.author: Buck

customer_reviews.title: Other than arriving with a bad wheel, this tank works great
customer_reviews.text: Had an issue with one of the caster wheels arriving damaged. Contacted customer service, uploaded a few images of the damaged wheel and they mailed me out a replacement... which took about a week to recieve. Other than arriving with a bad wheel, this tank works great... The older I get working in the automotive field, the more I find myself not needing tools, but needing things to make life easier on my joints, back, etc... using this waste oil tank and emptying it with an air line instead of lifting and dumping my old bucket, well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Manufacturing quality issue
customer_reviews.text: Overall manufacturing quality was very good, except for one issue. The problem was with the threaded hole used to lock the collection pan in place at the desired height. Manufacturer welded a nut on both sides of the tube allowing a knob to thread in and lock against the sliding tube. Problem is that the welds were poorly done and prevent the threaded knob to go deep enough to make contact with the tube... impossible to use as intended. I had to use a clamp for my first use... very disappointing and totally out of character with the rest of the product. If it weren't for this issue, I would love the product and would have given 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and price
customer_reviews.text: Extremely high quality. Very happy with this purchase. An absolute must have if you have a car lift in your shop. This one is the finest quality waste oil container on amazon. You will NOT be disappointed. If you need one, this is the only one to consider. (Unless you find one that’s made in USA which I could not sadly)
customer_reviews.author: shane

customer_reviews.title: Nice oil collector for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great oil can for the value. The stem extends far enough to get right under the oil drain on most vehicles while on the lift. Easy, quick adjustment of the collection pan. Nice capacity and easy to read oil level inside the can. Biggest complaint is the swivel casters on the front. They bolt up at kind of a funny angle that makes them roll a little wonky while pushing it around the shop, big deal!
customer_reviews.author: Nathan K.

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste money
customer_reviews.text: This tank leaks, doesn't have a way to tell how full it is or a valve to stop oil when pumping. waste of money and makes a huge mess on floor. requested a return but seller won't supply me with warranty info. and canceled return. 0 stars
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Quality control issues. Weld at the base of the ...
customer_reviews.text: Quality control issues. Weld at the base of the drain pan was incomplete. Tried to call and get replacement. Wasn't successful. Update: Spoke to customer service a second time and the part was shipped out and received within a week. Unit is working at 100% would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Came Mostly Assembled
customer_reviews.text: I was shocked to open the box to find the Tank mostly assembled. I just had to install two wheels, screw in the top, and the compressed air fittings. It took about 15 minutes. I used it to change the oil in my Corvette the next day. If you have a lift, this is a must-have for the trouble-free collecting fluids from cars you are working on.
customer_reviews.author: Αριστείδης

customer_reviews.title: do not buy!!!!
customer_reviews.text: After less than a year and using this thing sense February, the psi gauge is is so fogged you cant see it. The tank NEVER completely empties the tank, and now the empty line ruptured...This is maybe the worst unit I have used.. Price is not everything, its the integrity of the item...QUALITY,QUALITY,QUALITY!
customer_reviews.author: 912guy

customer_reviews.title: It is what it is.
customer_reviews.text: It is what it is. An inexpensive waste oil catch and nothing more. I don't say this to persuade you not to buy but the exact opposite. I give a 3 star review because the one I purchased for my shop leaks. With a little bit of orange RTV/silicon applied to the bottom of the discharge hose, wahala, no more leak. So if you're looking for an inexpensive oil catch this one may be what you need.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect had over a year not no broken parts nothing wheel still on product is awsome
customer_reviews.author: G Apple Head

customer_reviews.title: Terrific oil container!!! Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Terrific oil container. I use this routinely with my lift to drain oil, transmission fluid, differential fluid, etc. It makes working on cars so much easier and just about eliminates spilled fluids. Transferring the fluid from this tank is simple and easy. This is a MUST buy.
customer_reviews.author: Michael A Matthews

customer_reviews.title: No parts available. Junk!
customer_reviews.text: Buyer Beware! Check valve inside broke off after first use. Contacted Seller. Said 90 days is up and Manufacturer not sell parts for it. Going to throw it in the dumpster and order a good one. Tired of Made in China JUNK!
customer_reviews.author: Gary J. Guagenti

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the home mechanic. Seems well made and was easy to assemble. It's not what we had at the dealership, but it's still great. I haven't used it enough to drain it. I'll update my review if anything changes.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Bonneau

customer_reviews.title: Works great, great price.
customer_reviews.text: I have used a brand name version of this product at work for 10 years. This drain oil tank seems to be built slightly less heavy duty but will work just fine for what i'm using it for in my home shop. assembly was easy and I have had no problems with it in the first month. Will update should a problem occur.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Buy this one!
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I needed to make changing my oil in my vehicles easy. It is quite stable and well built and stores many oil changes worth of used oil effortlessly. Rolls well and extends to right under the pan. No leaks or spillage.
customer_reviews.author: Hans

customer_reviews.title: It’s perfect for oil and not having a mess on the floor
customer_reviews.text: Have had now for about 4months and has no leaks works perfect and would buy again. Wish I could have got this about 10 years ago
customer_reviews.author: Hulksmash

customer_reviews.title: good oil drain.
customer_reviews.text: nice oil drain.i looked at a lot of oil drains before buying this one and choose it because of all of the reviews where very much more positive for it even better than the much more expensive ones.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I expected better as this is an expensive oil drain
customer_reviews.text: I expected better as this is an expensive oil drain.The glass on the gauge is broken and a caster wheel is bent and losing ball bearings.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry B. Dodrill

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to any mechanics work shop.
customer_reviews.text: This was a great addition to my workshop. It’s a great product and works very well. It’s well built and is at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Hightower

customer_reviews.title: I like it, would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Seems like very good quality especially for the price. Easy to assemble. Moves around nicely with little effort. I haven't hooked air to it to empty it yet but if that doesn't work well I'll try to update this review.
customer_reviews.author: lucky lukes llc

customer_reviews.title: May require some paint removal to assemble properly
customer_reviews.text: Assembly required some modifications. The threaded adaptors on the tank were painted, so paint had to be removed to thread on pressure valve assembly. Seems to be a decent, affordable tank.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Van Horn

customer_reviews.title: Good oil pan for people with lifts.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in perfect condition and took about 10min to put it together. Can’t wait to use with first oil change.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What an amazing price! Heavy duty construction and easy to complete ...
customer_reviews.text: What an amazing price! Heavy duty construction and easy to complete assembly. Packaging was adequate even after carrier abuse.
customer_reviews.author: JAMES COOK

customer_reviews.title: working
customer_reviews.text: working good so far, replaced our old one that was leaking, so far this one is much better that our old one.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product for the price
customer_reviews.text: I looked around and for this price I could not find a better waste oil collector. Most of the competition had parts made of plastic and were too small. I really like this unit. I have it in my home garage and it performs like a commercial garage unit for me.
customer_reviews.author: H Schroeder

customer_reviews.title: Would highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Before I purchased this unit I read complaints about it didn't have a shut off valve for the hose when it's under pressure. I installed one, it was very easy to do and didn't cost much.
customer_reviews.author: Allen A.

customer_reviews.title: Yep, made in China!
customer_reviews.text: You would think that part number 5, an adapter nut could take a little more than hand torque before it snapped in half. The adjustable height feature appears to be non existent. Cheap plastic wheels and I have no real expectations on how long the regulator valve will last . May or may not be as good as the one I had from HF.
customer_reviews.author: SVM

customer_reviews.title: They are the best
customer_reviews.text: I got the oil drain and the air gauge was broken. What should have been a bad experience ended up with the best customer service that I have experienced in years. Will buy from them anytime. Ben
customer_reviews.author: Ben Ennis

customer_reviews.title: This is a replacement for the identical unit I purchased ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a replacement for the identical unit I purchased 6 years ago. the old one developed a leak near a weld.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: Since my son in law did not complain I assume it was fine.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for my hub
customer_reviews.text: Great, good quality. Have had it for a while. A must in the men's garage!
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: works as expected. I would buy it again if I needed another one.
customer_reviews.author: mark

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: The handle wobbles and the wheels arent always straight but it gets the gob done for a low price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worh
customer_reviews.text: It's an awesome product, but just have to be careful with emptying it.
customer_reviews.author: Bthomas63

customer_reviews.title: Made in China
customer_reviews.text: It will do the job. Too bad it’s made in China and the quality isn’t top notch.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Assembly was easy. didn't need to read the instructions
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was easy. didn't need to read the instructions. Came with a roll of teflon tape for pipe threads. Used it last weekend to change our daughter's and granddaughter's oil.
customer_reviews.author: ironmke

customer_reviews.title: Good value for your money
customer_reviews.text: Good value for your money. Purchased 2 of these. One of them had damaged casters. The mounting flange was bent from shipping and the wheel was bent beyond my abilities to repair it. I managed to bend the flange back to normal position, and purchased some upgraded casters for about $10.00 at a local store and it actually rolls over rougher surfaces better now. The regulator doesn't really seem to work though.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Esparza

customer_reviews.title: This unit is heavy duty and made for years of service
customer_reviews.text: Everything is fabricated out of materials that will hold up under years of service, I really like the wheels and casters. The slide tube isn't plastic like the other units my friends have in their shops.
customer_reviews.author: Derrell K

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: If you own the shop you got to have it I'm thinking to order another one to have it for spare
customer_reviews.author: pawel dada

customer_reviews.title: Leaks
customer_reviews.text: I had to JB WELD the drain plug because it leaked
customer_reviews.author: alan e.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I have other oil drain containers but none with a way to pressurize the container and get rid of the oil. This one is well built and super easy to use. I love draining the oil out with air pressure. Am considering buying another. I am a one man shop and use it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: V&W

customer_reviews.title: Justwatch out when grabbing the pipe after extending it
customer_reviews.text: Used it about 5 times since purchase, it works really well with no leaks or mess. Even with several oil filters in the funnel it drains well. Just watch out when grabbing the pipe after extending it, it'll be coated with oil :). Keep a rag handy to wipe it down.
customer_reviews.author: R. Mcanally

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: The 5 star reviews are correct. My box arrived undamaged and assembly was easy. I ordered the Lisle 15" no splatter pad with it. This tank makes oil changes under the lift a breeze. Quick drain and drain the filter on the pad while I'm finishing the oil change. The quality and construction for the price is amazing. BTW, just saw this same tank at HF on sale for $40 more than Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: LindaBrighton

customer_reviews.title: Quality control misfire
customer_reviews.text: Quality control issues. Weld at the base of the drain pan was incomplete. Oil leaks. Fixed with JB Weld and a roloc disc. Will update later.
customer_reviews.author: Mark A.

customer_reviews.title: Poor weld
customer_reviews.text: The poor quality weld at the bottom of the catch pan that connects to the final portion leaks like a sieve. To avoid the burden of the logistics to return the funnel to the manufacture, we decided to have a local professional welder fix the issue properly.
customer_reviews.author: Frederick J. Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: Needs to be a breather hole on top to allow air out cannot fill to top without lifting neck up. Otherwise works great
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: I would like for you to send me some new wheels
customer_reviews.text: the 2 front wheels they are bent and the bearings came out the first day after installation. they are blocked and do not rotate. I would like for you to send me some new wheels.
customer_reviews.author: Sergio Bruni

customer_reviews.title: Buy now!
customer_reviews.text: The best invention for Mechanic shop. No need to pick up the oil drain anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Mark B

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Took it out of the box and used it right away
customer_reviews.author: Joseph N.

customer_reviews.title: Poor Welding.
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was easy, product seems to operate as advertised. Welding of caster brackets and wheel mounts looks like was done by a three year old but so far, welds hold. My greatest concern was leaks but so far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: William F. Dawson

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. Does the job well. I just needed a special tool to put the wheel on. Other than that very easy to set up. I will just let if fill up then recycle at O'reileys. They said you can mix any oil you need to.
customer_reviews.author: DEG

customer_reviews.title: Item as promised
customer_reviews.text: Not perfect or for everyday use but great for the price and with few modifications and it works great for me! I had to replace the gauge as it was defective.
customer_reviews.author: Chawfon

customer_reviews.title: Very well put together
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived well packed and damage free. Works as it is suppose too. The only think I would change, would be to add a shut-off valve in the drain hose.
customer_reviews.author: TODD A BLUHM

customer_reviews.title: Great drain can!
customer_reviews.text: Have been using daily for a few months in shop. No complaints at all! May even be an improvement over the last one that we spent over twice as much for. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... say this is so very very well built and fun to use
customer_reviews.text: I gotta say this is so very very well built and fun to use. No plastic, thick steel, nice rollers, solid funnel and tube. I really am so glad i made this purchase!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: dave m.

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping from seller, priced was lowest i could ...
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping from seller, priced was lowest i could find, product is as described. -- Thanks ( kingston,TN. )
customer_reviews.author: Jason W.

customer_reviews.title: good tool for the money
customer_reviews.text: A low cost tool that performs the task it was designed for. adequate enough ,to be considered useful and reliable .
customer_reviews.author: Bookster

customer_reviews.title: Catch pan extension
customer_reviews.text: The only negative I have is that the catch pan does not extend high enough. I will put a coupling and a 12" pipe extension on it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff K.

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Works as you would expect. Pump out feature is nice. I've had it set up for a couple days and have used it for 3 oil changes ( home shop ) and had to try out the clean out, good bang for the buck.
customer_reviews.author: kb

customer_reviews.title: High quality well made product, especially at this price!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality, exactly what I was looking for. Shipping was fast and packaging was secure with no damage! Would definitely use this company again!
customer_reviews.author: Troy Browne

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product with very little assembly required...a couple large wrenches, pliers, and some Teflon tape.
customer_reviews.author: Harold Dwayne Valdez

customer_reviews.title: Ok product
customer_reviews.text: Unit works fine now. I had to weld up a pin hole where the funnel meets the downtube. It leaked. Other than that, its now a good product.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have been using it for 4months now easy to use and empty using the air hose. Ak-72
customer_reviews.author: athanasios k.

customer_reviews.title: Overall it's OK for the money, although one of ...
customer_reviews.text: Overall it's OK for the money,although one of the front casters ball bearings came apart after 2 days of use.Haven't emptied the tank yet,we will see I guess. I give it a 2.5 out of 5.
customer_reviews.author: Darrin Wolters

customer_reviews.title: easy assembly and works very well
customer_reviews.text: Way exceeded expectations! Very well build, easy assembly and works very well!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is great for changing oil with a lift. Haven't tried emptying it yet.

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Item as described. Works great. Was just what we were looking for.

customer_reviews.title: Saves a lot of time unloading waste oil to 55 gal container
customer_reviews.text: Product is very helpful for an auto repair shop. Saves a lot of time unloading waste oil to 55 gal container.

customer_reviews.title: This was a great home shop addition
customer_reviews.text: Used these when I was a mechanic at Nissan. This was a great home shop addition.

customer_reviews.text: Looks well built and assembled easily - have not used it or emptied oil from it yet. It wheels around the floor nicely, which I like.

customer_reviews.title: makes oil changes sooo much easier and cleaner
customer_reviews.text: solid built, easy to assemble, works like a charm...love it

customer_reviews.text: Love this. Good quality, does what it's suppose to do.

customer_reviews.text: The tank is nice but found lower clamp on hose to be cheap made from aluminum and after putting oil in tank it started to leak. I changed clamp because their clamp wouldn't tighten up and tank works great
customer_reviews.author: Keith Martin

customer_reviews.title: Not the quality I paid for!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am having allot of issues with the top funnel piece, the welds are incomplete causing oil to drain all over the place my first oils change with this was quite a disappointment with oil running all over my feet and garage floor. The seller has sent me a new one and when I received it it was banged up more holes in the welds letting water (ya I tested it this time with water) leak all over the place. My claim is still not settled. I paid extra for this model because I wanted good quality and that is not what I have received yet.
customer_reviews.author: D.J.

customer_reviews.title: Get At Home Oil Change Container.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for non professional oil changes at home just don't let it get completely full of 20 gallons of oil before you empty it since it will take quite a few containers to have on hand.

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This thing works great If you change oil using a lift get one of these

customer_reviews.title: Works fine but wish it had a shutoff valve on the oil drain line.
customer_reviews.text: Poor welding around the adjustable funnel which leaked oil. Had to repair.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality

customer_reviews.text: The item arrived on time and was exactly what I expected

customer_reviews.title: The tank is pretty good, but understand that you will need to ...
customer_reviews.text: The tank is pretty good, but understand that you will need to check all the fittings, tighten everything. also the drain plug on the bottom is crap. Seriously. It is a plug and not a drain bolt with a shelf like on an oil pan. It is super loose and even wrapping with silicone tape doesn't correct the issue. Oil will weep out of the bottom. I replaced the plug with a bolt and o-ring. it stopped the leaking.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Good Choice
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with purchase, Only negative thing was that it had to be modified a little to put together. Otherwise good quality.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: You can not go wrong with this oil drain pan.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks just like in the picture. Easy to use and simple to drain out used waste oil.

customer_reviews.title: i bought this unit and should have checked all functions ...
customer_reviews.text: i bought this unit and should have checked all functions of this unit, after a year and a half and it was full of oil," cause i only use it in my own garage" so i went to empty it with my compressor and found that it does not work! the pressure regulator does not work!! and i called amazon and they referred me to "one big outlet", as they are the retailer it came from. one big outlet did nothing!!! and i am stuck with a unit that does not work and no support from amazon or one big outlet!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kelstir

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This product works great , easy to use and no chance of spilling like our old tank.

customer_reviews.title: Works good.
customer_reviews.text: Gauge was broke when I received it, but they replaced it, no problem. Works good.

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I would have given it 5 stars but it leans forward. Even though the front wheels are smaller than the back wheels, I expected it to be level.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: ARKSEN 20 Gallon Portable Waste Oil Drain Tank Air Operated Drainage Adjustable Funnel Height w/Wheel, Red
feature_bullets: Ideal for extracting waste oil and other fluids from vehicles using venturi-vacuum extracting system or draining by gravity
(2) 3" Swivel Casters (Front) & (2) Fixed 6" Wheels (Rear); 15" Diameter Funnel With Filter Screen
Height Adjusts From 45" To 72-1/2" For Draining Fluids From Vehicles On Lifts
Includes swivel casters and polyurethane wheels for smooth and quiet maneuvering
Working Pressure: 10PSI - Gauge: Gauge: 0-23PSI In 0.5 PSI Increments; Regulator & Gauge With 1/4 Inch NPT Air Coupler

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars319 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
